website_summaries.verdict: Engineered to overcome the tough competition, the Visaro 2.0 Control FG sports a sleek and simple design that is welcomed by majority of users. Its upper offers a supportive wrap on the feet while the added texture detail improves ball touch and boosts performance. What reviewers love about this soccer cleat is its broader fit that caters to players with wider feet. However, some noted that it runs a bit large, particularly around the toes. In terms of pricing, this is one of the more affordable options out there.
pros: Players who tested the New Balance Visaro 2.0 Control Firm Ground appreciated its expanded width that accommodates those with wider feet
According to a majority of reviewers, this soccer cleat is one budget-friendly option for the occasional pick-up game
Many users were happy about the simple and sleek design of these firm ground soccer cleats
Majority of its users appreciate the supportive wrap that the upper of this cleat provides
cons: This Visaro model fits a bit large, said some individuals who tried it
Based on what a particular user said, these soccer cleats feel quite tight around the big toes
Some reviewers recommended getting ½ to a size bigger when purchasing this soccer shoe

customer_reviews.title: Not Wide by Anye Means
customer_reviews.text: This shoes was advertised as a wide. Unfortunately, it is more narrow than any other soccer cleat that I have purchased for my son. It is going back.
customer_reviews.author: Lori02

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove
customer_reviews.text: My husband has flat feet so finding the right wide size is hard. These fit him like a dream and we are very happy
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer  Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Super Narrow
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is the most narrow shoe in the mid section. I'm not sure why everybody says its wide.
customer_reviews.author: John T

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find a quality soccer boot that is wide and fits comfortably. Nice job on making a good shoe New ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes. Hard to find a quality soccer boot that is wide and fits comfortably. Nice job on making a good shoe New Balance.
customer_reviews.author: Dad

customer_reviews.title: I really like the shoe
customer_reviews.text: I really like the shoe . It very comfortable and light . Played in them last week and they felt real good . Most comfortable soccer cleats I have ever played in .
customer_reviews.author: Marcos Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: TO SMALL IT DIDNT FIT
customer_reviews.text: THE QUALITY OF THE SHOES ARE VERY GOOD THE MATERIALS AND VERY WELL MADE BUT IT IS TO SMALL FOR A 8.5 SIZE
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Tovar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wide feet!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. Needed a wide 7 on womens, but that seems to be tough to find. Went with the 6.5 mens 2E width, and they fit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Maria R.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: They are good cheap cleats that fit well, a little tough to break in.
customer_reviews.author: Kai Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Always buy a size up in soccer cleats. Maybe ...
customer_reviews.text: Always buy a size up in soccer cleats. Maybe 1.5 sizes! But these wider fit cleats were a life saver for my wide footed daughter!
customer_reviews.author: PharmerMomma

customer_reviews.title: Fit my big feet
customer_reviews.text: This shoe fits my big feet and is good for playing soccer in. What else can I say? I’ll buy another pair when these fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Bojangles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought them to run agility drills on turf. They work well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: New Balance Men's Visaro 2.0 Control Fg Football Boots
